name: Wandering Mule
desc:
Speed 30.
Taking damage does not force a Concentration saving throw to maintain Wandering Mule.
Hooves. +2 to hit, Melee. 1d4+2 bludgeoning damage.
flavor: It always manages to find its way back to you, with or without the cargo.

name: Dazzling Owl
desc:
Fly 60. Darkvision 120 ft.
Dazzling Owl can be sacrificed to cast a Transmutation Spell without Components.
Talons. +3 to Hit, Melee. 1 Piercing Damage.

name: Piling Rats
desc:
Speed 30. Swarm.
Bites: +2 hit, Melee in the Swarm's space. 2d6 Piercing damage.
flavor: The first line of defence for the ameteur Conjurer.

name: Moving Shrub
desc:
Speed 20.
While the shrub remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal shrub.

name: Marcus's Mastiff
desc:
Speed 40.
Bite: +3 to hti, Melee. 1d6 Piercing damage.
If Marcus's Mastiff is reduced to 0 hit points, it returns to your hand.
flavor: It follows its master's order with a blind loyalty, waiting for his eventual affection.

name: Rattling Skeleton
desc:
Vulnerable to bludgeoning.
Shortsword: +4 to hit, melee. 1d6 +2 piercing damage.

name: Skeleton Bard
desc:
Vulnerable to bludgeoning.
Trumpet: +2 to hit, melee. 1d4 + 1 bludgeoning damage.
Choose an target creature. As long as Skeleton Bard is on the field, said creature gains a +1 to hit.

name: Lucky Cat
desc:
Speed 40. Keen Smell.
Reaction: If you are subjected to a saving throw, you may cast Lucky Cat normally and gain advantage against that saving throw.

name: Storm Crow
desc:
Fly 60.
Talons: +4 to hit, melee. 1d6+2 piercing damage.
flavor: Storm crow descending, winter unending. Storm crow departing, summer is starting.

name: Mindless Drone
desc:
Speed 30. Multiattack 2.
Spear: +3, Melee or Ranged 30/120. 1d6+1 Piercing damage.
flavor: "Milyad made dozens of themâ€¦ left in his cellar. One day we found hundreds of stab wounds no his body."

name: Agile Bullywug
desc:
Speed 20. Multiattack 2.
Bite. +3 to hit, Melee. 1d4+1 bludgeoning damage.
Whenever you play a Component card, Agile Bullywug may take another move action.

name: Spined Devil
desc:
Fly 40. Immunities to Fire and Poison. Multiattack 2.
Tail Spine. +4 to hit, range 20/80. 1d4+2 Piercing damage plus 1d6 fire damage.

name: Olaf the Stout
desc:
Speed 30. Pack Tactics.
Shield Bash. +4 to hit, melee. 1d6+2 bludgeoning damage.
When Olaf the Stout is reduced to 0 hit points, you regain a 2nd Level Spell Slot.

name: Zealous Medic
desc:
Speed 30. Advantage on Medicine checks.
Dagger. +3 to hit, melee. 1d3+1 Piercing damage.
